value:
So your world celebrates a festival of
devotion, too? Did you receive a lot of
gifts?

I'm not used to formal wear like this...
It's restricting my movement.

Tell me, $Nu...
What...sort of things do you... No,
never mind. Forget I said anything!

Celebrations and sending gifts to
other tribes is important to people of
the plains.$k$pWe live divided across many different
tribes, so that helps us all keep in
touch.

I wish Hector and Eliwood would let
me join their sparring sessions... I
want to repay Hector for helping me.

Here's a gift for you from
$Nf. Please
accept it.

I'm doing better than I expected
in this outfit.

There's a proper form to battle,
just as there is with gift giving.

Trying to decide on a gift must
have distracted me...

Thank you. I'll return the favor in
the future. I promise.

I'm Lyn. I was told this outfit is
appropriate for a festival of love, but...
It's awfully difficult to move around in.

T-tell me, $Nu.
Is there a gift of...some sort...that
you'd like?$k$pOh, I'm sorry for asking such a
strange question out of the blue like
that. Was it very odd to hear?$k$pYou've been so helpful to me, I
wanted to thank you. I'm just not sure
the best way to say it...$k$pSo, I'll give you any gift that is within
my ability to give. Don't hold back.
Ask for anything.$k$pNow, tell me... What is it you want?
それっ！
あげるわ
いやぁっ！
そんな…！
Here's a present.
Take this!
From my heart!
I'm not sweet.
Broken...hearted.
あ…
My tribe also has a festival where we give each other presents.
Hya! Grr... You almost made me drop these presents.
I wonder what I should give my grandfather...
It's said that if you give a present to someone you love during this festival, you just may wind up as a couple.
What do I want? I'd need time to think about it.
How could I express my feelings with a gift?
So, um... Is there anything you want?
Wonderful.
A tough choice...
Which do you like?
